importUsers.introText: This dialog can be used to import users.
importUsers.dialogText:
Each entry in the input file must contain a value for either matriculation number, login or email.
Values for last and first name are optional.
importUsers.csvExampleText: Example of a valid CSV file format:

csvFile.label: Select CSV file
csvFile.tooltip: Please select the CSV file containing the students for the import. Either 'LOGIN', 'REGISTRATION_NUMBER' or 'EMAIL' column values must be present per entry. Use the following format: login, matriculation number, email, firstname, lastname. You need to use the header in the top row

usersForImport.label: Users to import
usersForImport.tooltip: These students will be imported when clicking on the "Import" button.
usersForImport.importFailed: Please repair the file, it could not be read due to the following error:
usersForImport.failedRows: The following rows are invalid and must contain a value in either login, matriculation number or email:
usersForImport.noUsersFound: No users to import have been found
